extracted-table.table-caption: Proportion of participants meeting target engagement goal for each level of analysis of cognitive control function.

caption.p: Proportion of participants meeting target engagement goal for each level of analysis of cognitive control function.

table-wrap-foot.p: CPT continuous performance task, FrSBe frontal systems behavior scale, CCN cognitive control network, rsFC resting-state functional connectivity.
The successful target engagement goal was defined as 66% of participants with significant improvement (z-score ≥ 0.5) in CCN measures (performance, self-report, circuitry) following 4 weeks of EVO.

extracted-table.transformed-table:
Table 1
Proportion of participants meeting target engagement goal for each level of analysis of cognitive control function.
Level of analysisN (%)
Cognitive control performance: AID/CPT23/34 (68%)
Self-reported cognitive control symptoms: FrSBe23/34 (68%)
CCN circuitry (task-based activation)25/34 (74%)
CCN circuitry (rsFC)21/29 (72%)CPT continuous performance task, FrSBe frontal systems behavior scale, CCN cognitive control network, rsFC resting-state functional connectivity.The successful target engagement goal was defined as 66% of participants with significant improvement (z-score ≥ 0.5) in CCN measures (performance, self-report, circuitry) following 4 weeks of EVO.
